Aug. 27, 1977 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Whitburn, 2nd Rochdale, 3rd Royal Doulton, 4th Dalmellington. Hymn tune contest - 1st Tredegar, 2nd Whitburn, 3rd Rochdale, 4th Kilmarnock.
9 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:29 p.m. Sept. 10, 2013, 9:01 a.m.

2 Trentham Brass Edward Gray Pageantry

4 Whitburn Band Allan Street
